name: Bigfoot Hunter: Deadly Shores Of Challenge Swat
name_original: Bigfoot Hunter: Deadly Shores Of Challenge Swat
description:
Bigfoot Island is the story of a Bigfoot's Revenge, into very unfamiliar terrain.

The soldier goes to a remote island where it's rumored that you can freely hunt Bigfoot.

The soldier goes there to investigate, but when he arrives he realizes that all hell has broken loose already.

The game's story is told through the investigations of the main character as he runs for his life through the labyrinthine halls of the massive building, discovering paperwork, finding clues and occasionally talking to people.

A island is an island with no people, where nobody lives & an undiscovered island.

Island sand is red, rumored to have absorbed much blood from past conquests. The lifeless trees rustle with dry breezes. Yet be ever careful, for even the water that lap at the dying tide is black. The evil of this island is ancient. Too ancient. Even for time to conquer...

It stood like an omen. Dark vibes radiating from the very shore. Trees swaying as if to warn off any who come near. Ash it was the ash of thousands of dead bodies scattered from the past.

Suddenly Bigfoot Awake & Ready To Take Revenge.

Download it today and see what the buzz is about!
